name: The Dream (Vladlen4i)
description:
This game was created in Twine.

 This game tells a story about an adventure in the dream, where main character meets forest's spirits on their way. They tell her different stories and behave differently. On the way player needs to make decisions how to behave in different situations to get various outcomes. Through the development of the plot, a player learn a few details about the life of the protagonist.
